tool.name: SAGA.ta_morphometry.10
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False isArrayHREL False output_data_MBI $output_data_MBI name SAGA.ta_morphometry.10 DEM $DEM HREL $HREL TSLOPE $TSLOPE TCURVE $TCURVE THREL $THREL prefer $prefer response $response outputType_MBI $OutputSection_MBI.outputType_MBI transmissionMode_MBI $OutputSection_MBI.transmissionMode_MBI

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: HREL
param.label: Vertical Distance to Channel Network
param.help: Vertical Distance to Channel Network The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, png, tiff, x-ogc-envi

param.name: THREL
param.label: T Vertical Distance to Channel Network
param.help: T Vertical Distance to Channel Network

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_MBI
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_MBI
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: <br/>References:<br/><br/>Friedrich, K. (1996): Digitale Reliefgliederungsverfahren zur Ableitung bodenkundlich relevanter Flaecheneinheiten. Frankfurter Geowissenschaftliche Arbeiten D 21, Frankfurt/M., <a href="http://user.uni-frankfurt.de/~relief/fga21/">online</a>.<br/><br/>Friedrich, K. (1998): Multivariate distance methods for geomorphographic relief classification. in Heinecke, H., Eckelmann, W., Thomasson, A., Jones, J., Montanarella, L., Buckley, B. (eds.): Land Inforamtion Systems - Developments for planning the sustainable use of land resources. European Soil Bureau - Research Report 4, EUR 17729 EN, Office for oficial publications of the European Communities, Ispra, pp. 259-266, <a href="http://eusoils.jrc.it/ESDB_Archive/eusoils_docs/esb_rr/n04_land_information_systems/contents.html">online</a>.<br/><br/>Moeller, M., Volk, M., Friedrich, K., Lymburner, L. (2008): Placing soil-genesis and transport processes into a landscape context: A multiscale terrain-analysis approach. Journal of Plant Nutrition and Soil Science, 171, pp. 419-430, DOI: 10.1002/jpln.200625039<br/><br/>
